name: Antoni Pater

projects.title: BloodGuard: AI Health Diagnosis via Blood Test Analysis
projects.description: Built an XGBoost model to classify blood test results, enabling predictions and accuracy evaluation with preprocessing.

projects.title: ChestXrayClassifier: AI-Powered Pneumonia Detection from Chest X-Ray Images
projects.description: Developed an AI diagnostic tool in PyTorch using DenseNet121 to classify chest X-rays as NORMAL or PNEUMONIA.

projects.title: Desktop learning application
